segments.text: Would you please wait this letter to see with the postages ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you want to sent this letter by ordinary or registered mail ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A post order for four hundred dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , you ’ d better have it registered .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will I be informed that my friend gets the letter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . When your friend gets it , he ’ ll sent the receipt which you send it by mail . then you can be sure he ’ s received .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I have a registered then .
segments.speaker: S1
